AI Description: SuiteSparse is a collection of libraries for sparse matrix computations that builds upon the functionality of the widely-used SPARSEKIT and HSL routines.
Core Features: Direct Methods For Solving Sparse Linear Systems, Iterative Solvers For Sparse Linear Systems, Graph Partitioning & Ordering Routines, Sparse Matrix Data Structures & Manipulation Routines
General Tags: Sparse Matrix Computations, Linear Algebra, Computational Mathematics, Numerical Algorithms
